statements: SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM StudentProgress WHERE program_name = 'Computer Science';
SELECT program_name, course_name FROM StudentProgress WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_students FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1234 AND program_name = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, grade FROM StudentProgress WHERE program_name = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY grade DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT program_name FROM StudentProgress WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY program_name;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_name) AS num_courses FROM StudentProgress GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_courses > 3;
SELECT program_name, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM StudentProgress GROUP BY program_name ORDER BY avg_grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM education_programs ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, grade FROM student_progress WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_description FROM education_programs WHERE program_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, program_id, course_id, grade FROM student_progress WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE program_id = 1 AND grade >= 3.0 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM education_programs WHERE program_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY program_id ASC
SELECT student_id, course_id, program_id FROM student_progress WHERE grade < 2.0
SELECT program_id, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM student_progress GROUP BY program_id ORDER BY total_students DESC
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_progress WHERE program_id = 2 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM programs;
SELECT student_id, subject, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, program_name, grade FROM students JOIN programs ON students.program_id = programs.program_id JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM students JOIN programs ON students.program_id = programs.program_id;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, subject, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;

SELECT first_name, last_name, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM students JOIN programs ON students.program_id = programs.program_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(grade) AS avg_grade, program_id FROM grades GROUP BY program_id HAVING avg_grade > 70 ORDER BY avg_grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT full_name, start_date FROM Students WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM Programs WHERE program_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, end_date FROM Students WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT grade_id, grade FROM Grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT full_name, start_date FROM Students ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM Programs WHERE program_name LIKE '%Engineering%';
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY grade DESC;

SELECT p.progress_id, s.full_name, pr.program_name FROM Progress p JOIN Students s ON p.student_id = s.student_id JOIN Programs pr ON p.program_id = pr.program_id WHERE p.progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, program_id FROM students WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, start_date, end_date FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_id FROM courses WHERE program_id = 2 ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, program_id FROM students WHERE program_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, student_name, start_date, end_date FROM students WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM programs WHERE program_type = 'Bachelor';
SELECT course_name, courses.program_id, instructors.instructor_name FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
